00018 /*
00019  * Synchronizer_Helper.h
00020  *
00021  *
00022  *  Created on: 07-Jan-2011
00023  *      
00024  */
00025 
00026 #ifndef SYNCHRONIZER_HELPER_H_
00027 #define SYNCHRONIZER_HELPER_H_
00028 
00029 #include <string>
00030 
00031 //!A helper class for the synchronizer
00032 /**
00033  * Each helper object implements synchronization algorithms
00034  * for maintaining the data structures in sync
00035  *
00036  * The Synchronizer class depends on this interface to enable
00037  * synchronization of a multi-machine LDA set-up
00038  */
00039 class Synchronizer_Helper {
00040 public:
00041     virtual void initialize() = 0;
00042     virtual void synchronize() = 0;
00043 
00044     //!Returns true as long as all items to be
00045     //!synchronized are not synchronized
00046     virtual bool has_to_synchronize() = 0;
00047 
00048     //!After this call, has_to_synchronize()
00049     //!should return true
00050     virtual void reset_to_synchronize() = 0;
00051 
00052     //!This is a callback from the Client
00053     //!when an async_putNget is used on the Client
00054     //!So when a Client is instantiated, you need
00055     //!to pass a reference of (*this)
00056     virtual void
00057             end_putNget(const std::string& word, const std::string& counts) = 0;
00058 };
00059 
00060 #endif /* SYNCHRONIZER_HELPER_H_ */
